# init(taskResolutionResult:)

**Initializer**

Creates an object whose resolution involves successfully deleting a task.

## Declaration

```swift
init(taskResolutionResult: INTaskResolutionResult)
```

## Parameters

- **taskResolutionResult**: The value that resolves the requested parameter of the intent. This value may be different than the one specified in the intent object.

## Return Value

A new [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INDeleteTasksTaskResolutionResult] object.

## Discussion

Use this method to create a result object when you’re able to delete a task.

## Creating a Resolution Result

- **unsupported(forReason:)**: Creates an object whose resolution requires the user to confirm the task before continuing.
- **INDeleteTasksTaskUnsupportedReason**: Constants that indicate the reason the app can’t support the delete task request.
